explains: n. 双门小轿车；双座四轮轿式马车；高脚香槟酒杯；甜点盘

sentences.en: While waiting at a traffic light, they saw a black Mercedes coupe on one side and a homeless man begging for food on the other.
sentences.cn: 在红绿灯旁等候的时候，他们看见一辆黑色奔驰轿车在一边，一个无家可归的人在另一边乞讨食物。

sentences.en: Entrechat, coupe, cabriole, chasse were steps codified by then.
sentences.cn: 转门、轿式、轿式、槽式都是当时已经形成的步骤。

sentences.en: hoping to take the coupe-cabriolet market by storm!
sentences.cn: 这款全新的雷诺似乎要在敞篷跑车市场掀起一阵暴风骤雨。
